alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 11:52PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT WEBER...CACHE...NORTHEASTERN BOX ELDER...NORTHWESTERN RICH...DAVIS AND WEST CENTRAL MORGAN COUNTIES... At 1146 PM MST...an area of moderate snow was spreading into the northern Wasatch Front, Cache Valley, and northern Wasatch Mountains. This area of snow is spreading east at 15 mph. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Logan, Farmington, Brigham City, Tremonton, Hill Air Force Base, Cache, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, Clinton, North Ogden, South Ogden, Centerville, Smithfield, Washington Terrace, Riverdale and Hyrum. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 322 and 394. Interstate 84 between mile markers 41 and 99. US Route 89 between mile markers 459 and 492. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of snow. * snowfall accumulation of 1 to 2 inches inches is expected in this area of snow along the valley floors, with the benches and higher elevations picking up a quick 2 to 4 inches. With very cold temperatures in place any snowfall will quickly stick to all untreated surfaces. Be prepared for winter driving conditions if traveling across the area into the overnight hours.
